dict.acceptation: 男孩，少年；儿子；小伙子，家伙；服务员；

sent.orig: One boy is a boy, two boys half a boy, three boys no boy.
sent.trans: 一个和尚挑水喝，两个和尚抬水喝，三个和尚没水喝。

sent.orig: One boy is a boy, two boys half boy, three boys no boy.
sent.trans: 一个和尚挑水吃，两个和尚抬水吃，三个和尚没水吃。

sent.orig: Green boy is a philosophy Green boy is a boy with positive thoughts.
sent.trans: 绿色小男孩是一个有着积极想法的男孩，他体现出一种处世哲学。

sent.orig: A Small Boy and a DonkeyA small boy leading a donkey passed by an Army camp.
sent.trans: 小男孩与驴子一个小男孩牵着头驴子穿过部队营房。
